snippet: Ms. Miller used labor unions to press for equal rights for women in the workplace and broke into the male-dominated leadership of the A.F.L.-C.I.O.
abstract: Joyce D Miller, an influential advocate for women who broke into the male-dominated leadership of the AFL-CIO, dies at age 84.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Miller used labor unions to press for equal rights for women in the workplace and broke into the male-dominated leadership of the A.F.L.-C.I.O.

headline.seo: Joyce D. Miller, Advocate for Women, Dies at 84
headline.main: Joyce D. Miller, Breaker of Glass Ceilings, Dies at 84
headline.print_headline: Joyce D. Miller, Breaker of Glass Ceilings, Is Dead at 84

keywords.value: American Federation of Labor-Congress of Industrial Organizations
keywords.name: organizations
